website_summaries.verdict: Considering its low price point, you'll appreciate the 18-lb. carbon fiber drag on this reel for bigger fish.
pros: Available in either a right- or left-handed design, which is convenient
Has a low-profile design that many fishermen really like
Easy to reel in the line quickly with this smooth performing freshwater reel
Uses several shielded stainless steel bearings to keep the reel in top working condition
cons: May make a high pitched screeching noise as you're casting, which is unsettling

customer_reviews.title: Piscifun Torrent is way better than the Kasting Royale Legend
customer_reviews.text: I love the Piscifun Torrent Baitcasting Reel. For the price, you simply can't beat it. I had bought a KastKing Royale Legend Baitcasting reel before this one and it was just a backlash magnet. I thought it was just because I was inexperienced, but nope was not the case. The Torrent performed beautifully on my first outing with it. Only had one or two back lashes, in about a hundred casts. This reel is amazing. Hope it holds up over time, and I expect it will.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and then some!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a baitcaster before and couldn't justify spending hundreds on a new reel so I picked this one based on the Amazon reviews and reviews on youtube. I was impresed with the fact that all the negative reviews had a response from Piscifun. This is an awesome reel and I gotta say I would definitely recommend this to people just starting out or on a budget. I mounted it on an ugly stik gx2 medium heavy fast action rod and it is an awesome combination. Attached is a photo of a 4.5 to 5 pound bass I caught on my fourth cast with this reel. Will definitely be buying more Piscifun products.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Like this reel
customer_reviews.text: This Reel is Amazing for the price, I paired it with the Torrent Baitcast Rod and their performance is Fantastic! I caught a couple of 5Lbs. Large Mouth Bass with this reel with no problem at all. The Reel feels good in your hand, The Dragging never failed to me when fighting those 5 pounders, I was able to reel them almost to the tip of the rod!! LOL!! I seriously don't get the poor reviews for this Reel because to me it's one of the best reel for the money. I currently own couple of Revo's, Shimanos and Lew's but this Torrent reel is my buddy!!
customer_reviews.author: Big Moe

customer_reviews.title: The Torrent Is An Awesome Reel!
customer_reviews.text: I love this reel, super smooth, casts great excellent value and very durable. Got to fish it today and I can say with confidence you won't be disappointed with the performance. The 6 bearings are super smooth and the 18lb drag has no slip when you crank it down. The individual click on the spool tension adjustment is a feature you usually see on higher priced reels. The features they packed inot a inexpensive reel are amazing. Watch the video to see my thoughts, casting, and catching a fish!
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Gliba

customer_reviews.title: My first baitcaster
customer_reviews.text: After shopping for a baitcaster, I decided to try the new Piscifun Torrent. This is my first baitcaster and surprisingly easy to use. I practiced a few cast and did not have a rats nedt until I got a little too confident and backed off the tension setting, lol. Overall I love the look, feel, and smooth action of the reel. The Torrent seems like a quality product. I am very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!Great reel for a crazy good price...
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Piscifun Torrent reel in the mail today and man am I happy!I have a reel repair business and I took it down to the screws and it has great components from stainless steel bearings to premium brass gears.I recommend this reel for any fisherman who wants a great reel for a crazy price..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong for 40$
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reel base on a YouTube video of this reel vs the kastking royale legend. For 40$ it’s not a bad reel it’s actually a great reel for 40$ but I have the kastking royale legend too and I’ll have to disagree with the YouTube video, this reel the Torrent will not out cast the kastking royale legend distance wise and smoothness from my personal experience
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great baitcaster reel and easy to set it up
customer_reviews.text: First time using a baitcaster reel. It took me a few casts to set it up and cast well. Used monofilament on it, but soon will replace it with a backing and the main line will be multifilament. Had success in South America rivers, it was too easy to bring the fish that I fell in love with this reel.
customer_reviews.author: PabloG

customer_reviews.title: Fisherman's Dream #Torrent
customer_reviews.text: Folks, BAR NONE, #PisciFun the ONLY name I'll buy from this day on. I'm 52 and grew up Montana. Fished every reel rod out there under 100, The Torrent, paired with Torrent Rod will eat ANY competition out there. Folks, make sure you do a quick run through maintenance, oil grease, snug the screws just to make sure all goes well on your first trip out. #GoWithFamily
customer_reviews.author: Frederick m.

customer_reviews.title: Best reel ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely amazing reel. You may look at this and say well I don't want it if it's cheap but this is totally not true here. This reel is smooth, looks clean, and casts like a dream. I would buy like 4 of these. You can't beat this reel for the price. Absolutely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tville Mom

customer_reviews.title: great ballance, hight speed reel
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a left hand bait caster over a right hand that I have used for years. This reel is fantastic. I spooled it up with braided line. Made a few minor adjustments before trying it out. I made a few casts at home and had no issue or backlash problems. I went fishing the next day used it for a good 4 hours of casting and to my dis-belief I did not have a single issue or backlash. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a bait cater, whether its a left or right hand modal. P.S. although is did not have much luck fishing time will tell how the drag system works.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Cooley

customer_reviews.title: I'm Still Learning With This One.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a cheap bait caster where I wouldn't spend to much time learning. Well, I spent weeks trying to figure out how to use this reel. I put everything on max and then adjusted my the settings so that the line drops just by letting the tension off. I would cast the line and it would fly into the water 2 feet in front of me. It didn't matter how much weight I had or how little. I will have to keep trying but testing other bait casters I was able to cast no problem. My guess is every bait caster is different.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive casting reel to expand my inventory and skill.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this reel, but it looks very nice so far. Paired it with an Entsport 7' cf rod, 8-20# test. Action is smooth and I like the dual cast drag controls. Nice that there is a port for lube right on the side too. We'll see after I get it on the water how well it performs, but so far it looks promising. The rod and reel together let me put together a saltwater casting rig for under $80 so I can expand my techniques. (Mostly just a spinning gear guy).
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Thought I had a jewel maybe not
customer_reviews.text: Went to the lake today and took 2 of these with me new in box, 5-7 cast and get a little nest no biggy waiting for it to throw out... All the sudden i realize my line fell behind my spool... Thought ok maybe i did that, 3 more cast in does the same thing... Line up second one and i be damned if about 9-10 cast it does the same thing. Really a shame i love the reel, lightweight, throws really good, drag could be smoother... but i cant put up with that now that im out 70.00 in Braid Slick V2.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Reel doesn’t stand up to saltwater use
customer_reviews.text: Reel doesn’t stand up to saltwater use. I live in Florida on the Indian river and put this reel to use. I religiously rinse my reels with fresh water after each use. It lasted 10 days fishing before it started to corrode internally. I took the reel apart and cleaned it all up but the damage was done. Saltwater made it down the spool inside the reel. Still works ok but I need to break it down and clean every 10 Trips or so. That butter smooth cast is gone but it works. I still have the reel but bought another for saltwater use. This would be an amazing freshwater reel
customer_reviews.author: Dana Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding piece of gear
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo smooth..And a little bit of water proof lubricant made it even smoother..I played with it in the back yard and within 10 mins i had it where it didnt do the whole bird next drama..Taking it out tomorrow for some bass fishing,will update how it goes..You could spend a ton of money 3/4 times the cost of this Piscifun and not get the same quality..never ever expected a 40 dollar reel to just blow me away...
customer_reviews.author: robert murrell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this reel. I was not sure if it was going to be something I would keep. I have very small hands and most reels are too large and heavy. As you can see by the picture this reel fits in my hand and is not bulky or awkward. Its very smooth and feels perfectly balanced. The adjustments for setting the drag are also easy to adjust. This would be perfect for any experienced or beginner angler. I will be putting this one on one of my bass rods and will be ordering another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: C Craig

customer_reviews.title: Super Smooth!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second baitcaster and I've paid more for the Kastking Speed Demon Pro than this one and this thing is so smooth when casting and reeling. It makes bringing in fish a charm without much struggle. I like the click sound on the drag because the Speed Demon doesn't have that and I've thrown 30lbs braid GODline x8 on it and I have fished different species with success. I've had only a few birds nest happen and it was nothing real bad. I'm a fan of this baitcaster and would buy more from them if I had too.
customer_reviews.author: Inspiration

customer_reviews.title: The best baitcaster I have ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly new to bass fishing. I purchased several baitcaster reels throughout the years and I got frustrated with all. Some were extremely expensive. Mostly were user error, I constantly got backlash on every 5th to 10th cast. I decided to just use spinning and spin casting reels for years. I decided to give the torrent a try, and I absolutely love it. I keep brake between 5 and 6 and I never backlash. Super easy to use!!! I love it so much I purchased 2 of them. I have one on a 7 foot medium heavy action with floro. My other is on a 6 foot med with mono. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michail Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: This reel is amazing! It floats like butter I went from a $30 rod/pole combo from BassPro to this and bought a Baitcasting rod. My father in law always goes into tournaments every Sunday and he was like 6 Baitcasting reels and a bunch of others. He enjoyed it and helped me tune it in. First fish I caught was a 20LB catfish who sadly snapped my rod due to him going under where I was fishing and couldn’t adjust so the rod snapped. The reel did it perfect however and reeled him in like butter I was ecstatic. I do recommend using braided line or heavy heavy fishing line.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product at a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this reel ,very high quality at a very low and affordable price. I honestly bought this reel as a travel setup. A beater to keep in my truck with a two piece rod for when I happened to get off work early and I can hit up the water in a second. This thing exceeded All my expectations to the point where I cannot follow my own plan I would feel very bad if this thing was taken for my truck. A very smooth casting reel that can very easily be compared to a Shimano or Abu Garcia.
customer_reviews.author: Jmgarcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and performance
customer_reviews.text: Found the Piscifun Torrent Baitcaster reel on a lightning deal, after following the manufacturer and this reel for some time, and decided to buy it. It arrived quickly and I used it the next weekend. I’m am pleasantly surprised at the performance and quality of the reel based on the purchase price. After another couple of uses on rods I already owned, I purchased the matching rod. I continue to be very pleased with both. I did have an opportunity to interact with Piscifun Customer Service and was also very impressed with the email support. I will be returning to this company when I need additional fishing equipment.
customer_reviews.author: BP1122

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Reel!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bait caster! My son who is a big fisherman wanted a new one & wanted to spend way too much on one so I challenged him to research & find one under $50 and this was the top of his list. He used it months last summer and really enjoyed it- thought was great quality for price! I put a three star for beginners cuz a bait caster reel isn’t really for most beginners, yet still easy enough to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Winnie

customer_reviews.title: A $40 Reel Can't Be this Good... Right?
customer_reviews.text: I got this reel to put on a 7' MH-F Daiwa Laguna rod. Whole setup was less than $70. Just wanted something in the truck in case I came across a pond that needed a quick cast or two. I have some 12# Trilene on it and usually a 1/4" Texas rig tied on and can cast it just about where ever I need to with that setup. Probably 50 LMBs on it, up to my pond PB for the year at 3.5lbs. Yeah, my Shimano SLX XT is nicer, but it cost 3X the price. This would make a great first baitcaster for a beginner and has proven to be great for an old guy like me as well.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Okay reel, for the price, I was hoping for a little better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Had the reel for a few months now. It's starting to make some noise of rubbing. I fish alot with other medium to high ends reels and rods for freshwater and saltwater fishing. I was hoping to find a reel that would stay smooth when casting. If you want a low end reel for a great price, I would purchase the Royal legend from Kastking. I own 2 and have had them for 2 and 3 years. Never needed to take them apart and clean them and they work well in saltwater as long as you rinse them off afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am getting back to fishing after a 10 year absence. Took this opportunity to update some of my gear and try out bait casting again. (Disaster last time) This reel offered all of the requirements I was looking for 7:1 retrieve, lightweight and small profile. After getting the reel spooled with 17lb Flourocarbon , I took it to a local lake to try out. I bird nested several times, but after remembering the adjustment process, got much better at casing. I will be buying at least one more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working properly after a day.
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted to love this reel like so many others do. However after one day it started to make an extremely loud, almost screaming noise when I casted. I contacted their customer care and they said to oil the reel. I did, but it did not fix the problem. There next solution was to ship it to them for warranty work....So yeah, just giving up and sending it back to Amazon. Now I am out $20 of line as well.
customer_reviews.author: J-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. Perfect for a beginner baitcaster.
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this reel. It hasn’t birdnested or anything on me. I read a lot of reviews about it needed oiled before use. I forgot to do that before I took it out and it was perfectly fine. I put mono line on it and it’s been perfect for me so far. I’ve been out with it 3x now. It’s a really nice lightweight but not too light reel I’m waiting to get the torrent rod once it’s back in stock too. Should be a perfect little duo. I will update later if things change.
customer_reviews.author: Katielynnu

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Reel for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use the reel, but by looks and feel alone you can't go wrong with the Torrent. I have a lot of bait casters, and I have paid four times as much for most of them. I recently bought an inexpensive reel from another company just for dragging worm harnesses, and I wish I had known about this reel before I wasted my money on the other one. This reel looks better, feels better and is much smoother. The large handle with soft grips is really nice. I'll probably buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: JNPDX

customer_reviews.title: Nice reel!
customer_reviews.text: Very light, nice looking reel. I have over 8 hours fishing with no problems. I put 40 lb braided line (Piscifun) on the reel to see how it works. A little heavy for bass casting; switching to 20#. Very pleased! (My go-to reel before was a 1970-71 Abu Garcia 5000 C. Still going strong but heavy.) Only thing missing from the Piscifun box was a simple set of instructions for set up adjustment and maintenance but YouTube knows all. Have not checked Piscifun for instructions. Again I am very pleased with the Torrent!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bait casting reel for first time bass fisherman
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I tried using a bait casting setup and got tired of making rats nests so sold the setup and fished happily on with my spinning reel. My son now wants to catch bass so i picked up the Piscifun Torrent to use on a 6ft Shakespeare pole. Received the reel a couple weeks ago and agree with reviewers as to the quality! Thanks to youtube videos, I was able to figure out how to setup the reel and cast without many rats nests. I fished all day today and the reel felt and performed great!
customer_reviews.author: Hung Lo

customer_reviews.title: The name defines the product
customer_reviews.text: This is one fun little reel. Once you get it set up it does the job well and makes catching fish fun. Fishing with light tackle is always a good way to add more fun to your fishing life. While there are fish you will likely lose with a light outfit like this, most of what we catch is under 25 lbs. so this reel and a well matched rod will bring you hours of "FishFun!"
customer_reviews.author: C. Druitt

customer_reviews.title: Love Piscifun reels
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new reel for a new rod I received. So I love Piscifun’s reels . So I bought this and when I first used it it seemed a little noisy. I then opened it up and put a drop of reel oil on the spindle and it has performed perfectly since. I also own the phantomX. Piscifun always impresses me great reels for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sturm

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: I had the kastking Royale legend before this, and I liked it. I don't have it anymore because I was being too clumsy with it, so lesson learned. after that I decided to try this one. It felt nice right out of the package, but when I took it fishing, it felt stiff. it would either cast far but get backlashed and make a rattling noise, or it would only cast about 10 feet and be really stiff. The kastking Royale legend is MUCH better. just go with that one.
customer_reviews.author: Hildegarde

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty great piece of machinery. Not that great with words, but these guys deserve a review. I'm way more familiar with spin casting reels, but decided to dip my toe into bait casting. The first bait casting reel I bought was terrible. I would get so many backlashes, and just made it that much harder to learn with. I recommend getting this reel if you're a first timer. Super easy to use, nice and smooth, and feels great in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Menefee II

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: With many baitcast reels going for $100 or more, this is a great value (so far). I have another much older Shimano reel ----the equivalent would now sell for well over $100, and I don't see the difference in my inexperienced use of baitcast reels. Have not used it for long yet---so longevity and durability is still TBD.
customer_reviews.author: Choochoo

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Reel
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I would give this baitcaster a try and see how well it performs. I fish for walleye, bass, steelhead and salmon where I live along the St. Joseph river in Michigan. The reel has performed well with heavy lures and #3-5 spinners using 12# pound mono and up to 30# Berkley fireline. Make sure you oil it before you use it, once you tune the reel to your bait/lure and adjust the brake to your experience then it performs very well. When I have the extra cash I will try out one of the 4000-5000 series spinning reels with heavy drag for fall add winter steelhead.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Even though it’s pretty cheap$$, it seems to be a pretty decent ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though it’s pretty cheap$$, it seems to be a pretty decent little reel. I’ve had my share of birds nests, and without any users manual in the box or online, you’re kind of expected to understand how baitcasters function. I’ve been using 30lb braid (flouro coated) and with a larger lure you can really get some good cast distance. I paired this with a piscifun med rod
customer_reviews.author: Atticus Sain

customer_reviews.title: Buy this reel!!!
customer_reviews.text: For beginners or professionals cast really far and smooth. No issues with the performance. Knobs click and are very tight for a reel at this price. I have a more expensive Lews reel that this feel very similar in comparison. Don’t hesitate and just buy this reel. If a person complains they just don’t set the reel properly for each lure.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: I’m extremely happy with this reel
customer_reviews.text: Having paid 2-3 times as much for other brands, lews , abu, and shimano. I’m extremely happy with this reel. I did try Kast king bad experience. But this piscifun torrent is a great reel for 40$. Love the oil port, easy adjustment. Centrifugal and magnetic brake work as expected. Click adjust drag and brakes love it! The way it should be! Cast great. Retrieve is smooth enough. Not wow!. Weights not bad at 7.2.30” per turn is fast enough. Only had a month but I’m telling you if it last all season I’ll buy 3 next year. Thank you piscifun!
customer_reviews.author: D PARSON

customer_reviews.title: Chattery dry drag but smooth casting
customer_reviews.text: A good real for the price. Piscifun customer service responded quickly to a concern I had with dry drag washers. It's not uncommon for these Chinese reels to not be lubed properly from the factory. I have no idea how long these reels will last, but my first couple fishing trips fund the reel to perform well. Except for the rather dry chattery drag. ( I also purchased a kastking Spartacus plus from eBay at the same time. This reel had a smoother drag and also performed well) These Chinese reels do perform well initially, but the jury is out on how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Frev

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Just my opinion....this is without a doubt the best reel out there when it comes to "bang for your buck" not best overall. Yes it takes a thorough oil and lube job out of the box to get it ready but it's easy to access and when done right just about as smooth as it can get when you're talking about value baitcaster reels. I hilay recommend. I think you will be surprised at what you get for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: Works great and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been fishing for over 35 years and I usually use Shimmano reels and don’t get me wrong I love my Shimmano’s but I was looking for something less expensive and if I lost it wouldn’t be upset But I’m gonna order another one of these it works great and really quite and smooth I’m using it with 20lb braid on a 7ft MH rod flipping stick and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Culotta

customer_reviews.title: Impressive reel for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Not being familiar with Piscifun I was a bit skeptical about the quality of a $35.99 reel, but after reading many positive reviews I decided to give one a try. So far I've been pleasantly surprised, it casts as smoothly as some of my other reels that cost a lot more. Feels nice, looks nice. Can't speak to its durability yet but it seems to be well-built. Time will tell! Definitely happy with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: MrBill92124

customer_reviews.title: What's up 🖕
customer_reviews.text: I loved this reel, then it fell out of boat and I lost it, and the rod, water was about 25ft deep, even tho I'm a stud, it was to deep for me to dive down and get the setup. I even tried to troll area with treble hooks no luck. . I had it spooled with 30 lb spider wire and a Rapala rip stop lure. And it all was on my G. Loomis E6X seven foot $189.00 rod. Its all gone dammit. But the reel was super sweet cast a mile and a half, very smooth. I only had it about 2 weeks Dammit. I'm buy another soon tho.
customer_reviews.author: Bushcraft Master

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from PISCIFUN !
customer_reviews.text: For $40 it's not a bad choice by any means. However, go with the KastKing Royale Legend for the same price. This just feels like a knockoff version of KK Royale Legend. If you're dead set on getting a Piscifun (Lame name btw ) go with the Perseus. It is also the same price, and feels a little more quality Update : STAY AWAY from PISCIFUN altogether. The Perseus is garbage too
customer_reviews.author: Ed Grimmsley

customer_reviews.title: Good gear.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered had something wrong with the spool mechanism. It would not reel in the string evenly. They sent me another one and it has been working good. I also got the Torrent rod that goes with the reel. They both work good. Its not the best gear but for the money, I'm satisfied. I've been using it more than my other rods for the last couple of weeks so that says alot.
customer_reviews.author: S. RiveraTop Contributor: Bass Guitars & Gear

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Since I first found this real on Facebook about 2 months ago, I have purchased 4 of them. Best reel for the dollar, extremely smooth and cast a mile. I am planning to replace all of my reels so there will be more orders from me. Once you try this reel, you will be exited too. Preforms as well if not better than my 2 and 3 hundred dollar reels. If you are a weekend fisherman or a professional, you should try this reel. You will not regret it. Update as of 4/1/20, I now have 6 of these reels. My plans are to replace all my older reels with this one. I love this reel.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Swain

customer_reviews.title: Learned my lesson, wouldn't recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: I've been using casting reels for many, many years. I have never, in my life, fought a reel as much as this one. I used a line spooling station to load the spool. It is basically in a constant state of backlash. I finally gave up on it and bought a new Shimano SLX and guess what, no more backlashes. I can't understand all of the positive reviews on this reel, I've got some cheap-o Walmart casters that are better than this one
customer_reviews.author: Dustin M.

customer_reviews.title: A little whine with your baitcaster
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good reel. The only Lt reason not to give it 5 stars is a loud whine when casting. I have caught quite a few large bass using this reel and it performs superbly. This reel will cast a lure very far, just has a loud whine when casting. The whine developed the first day I started using it. Even after making adjustments and fine tuning it to different lures I still get the whine. Not a problem to fish with just a little weird. I will likely buy another reel in the future so don’t let this review deter you. It’s a good reel.
customer_reviews.author: Nosibreh 3

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Kastking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reel after already having some of the other popular budget reels, ie a couple Kastkings and Abu Garcia Black Max. Those other reels aren't bad by any means, but this Piscifun feels SO much better and smoother. All the reels I have all fall in that $40 price range and this one is, by far, the best feeling. I would recommend this over the others that I have.
customer_reviews.author: KnowsEnoughToBeTrouble

customer_reviews.title: Very good reel for beginners using baitcasting reels.
customer_reviews.text: I just recently used the reel and I really like it. It's easy to adjust the settings and the casting is smoothe. Im using this reel for Saltwater and it's doing it's job. I like that it's easy to oil and service. I'm still new to using baitcasting reels and I think this would be a good reel to use for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Inconstant spool tensioner
customer_reviews.text: This is not bad for a beginner starting of with a baitcasting reel. There are other big name that cost a little more but would be more satisfying. After sailing the spool tension and brake, the cast was inconstant. I would get a bird nest just after a few cast and the condition hasn't changed. I'm going to play with it a little more before I gift it for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: N Vo

customer_reviews.title: Good baitcaster for a budget
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with a 7' MedHvy Abu Garcia rod and the whole setup is light and works really well. For a beginner, it's really easy to configure so that you get the basics down using a baitcasting setup. I've had minimal backlashes while trying to find the right settings, but that is not a fault of the reel as it is user error. Reeling in is super smooth and can handle the big fish no problem with the biggest to date being a 5lb Largemouth. If you're looking for a good beginner reel on a budget, I'd recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: afeldvary

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy and no Backlash
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this reel you really can't go wrong, if this reel is set right for the weight of your lure you will not get any backlash, I tried to get it to backlash after I set it and it wouldn't, great reel for a beginner and the pro's.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum G.

customer_reviews.title: The Torrent is Legit!
customer_reviews.text: This Torrent is my new go to reel. It's amazing the quality and features Piscifun can pack into this reel for the price. Loving the new handle design, and the smoothest 6 bearing reel I've ever used. 18lbs of smooth drag, I've pulled good fish out of the slop multiple times with no problems. Hard to believe this isn't a $100+ reel. Currently have 4, plan on adding more, and have multiple buddies switching from their Quantums, Pfluegers, Lews, and Shimanos. Like mentioned before, these reels can't be shipped with much lube in them for fire hazard purposes. So lube them up when you get them, and you will have a great reel that will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received this reel for a christmas present, used it ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband as a christmas gift, he used it about 3 times and it no longer worked. The lock mechanism did not lock. He threw it away and no longer has it. By the time I contacted the reps, he had tossed it. The reps were very helpful and wrote to us and even offered to fix it, but it was too late. So I am adding more stars for the response and willingness to help from Piscifun.
customer_reviews.author: Customer CAL

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: First baitcasting set up, wanted something “budget.” Paired up with a last king perigee II. It shipped fast. So far it’s proven to hold up to some travel in my truck bed and a few fish. Salt water and fresh water. So far 3lb fish is my biggest catch, so not a lot of stress on it yet. It has started to squeak after getting dipped in water. Needed some lube. The adjustments seem to work well, I don’t get many backlashes, and for my first baitcaster I think I’m doing well.
customer_reviews.author: C & S

customer_reviews.title: Durabiltiy is not good. It will probably last less than a year before you start having issues.
customer_reviews.text: Love my reel.. Its very smooth. Feels good in the hands.(edit) having the reel for just less than a year I am dropping my 5 star rating. The reel does work but it starting making this grinding noise when i reel. I opened it up to grease and lube the reel and there is rust in the reel. Why I have no idea.? Never opened it before. Never used it for saltwater. Well I cleaned it out and it someone smooth but the grinding noise was only minimized.
customer_reviews.author: OnlyJuan

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Great little real. But don't drop it or use for salt water. They suck in salt water. Gears start grinding after every use. It started after first use. Yes i oil my things up but piscifun bait casters no more.for.me
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B

customer_reviews.title: line guide is defective
customer_reviews.text: The line guide works on retrieval, but not when casting. I have submitted a message supplier, awaiting response. I will update when appropriate. The compay got back in touch with me and helped me to my satisfaction. It appears my assumption that the line guide was not working properly was incorrect. The line guide is working as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Shocked and pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: For the initial on boxing I am rather surprised. This real can hold quite a bit of line and it is super smooth. I took it for a small and counter in my backyard in the canal and it handled itself very well. It was very easy to cast and very easy to adjust and tune. It handled some medium size bass rather well. Where it surprises me is when I switched to a catfish rig it was able to handle A decent sized catfish with a relative ease. The Drag is super smooth and very easy to work with. So far pretty impressed
customer_reviews.author: David Balado

customer_reviews.title: A must have to the collection
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good budget baitcaster and after looking at the goods reviews this torrent had I decided to give it a shot. Shipping was fast as promised by seller. Right out of the box I could tell I made the right decision so I spoiled it up and took it to the lake. Smooth casting a good 30yards once dialed in held up good against some 2lbs and 4lbs bass. I wanted to see how the reel preformed against a bigger fight slo I took it down to the pier and pit it up against some snook. Overall I'm happy with the real, I would recommend to anyone looking for a budget baitcaster. Happy fishing🐟🐟
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Looked Used...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd PisciFun Torrent bait caster. Good quality reel for the $. How ever this is the first time I have received a really bad scuffed up beat reel when it is supposed to be new. Not sure what happened. Was going to return it but not worth the time and hassle when I have a kayak fishing tourne this weekend. Probably my last PisciFun item to be honest. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: crazy-cruz20

customer_reviews.title: It works but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Can be a good reel if you are on a budget and as long as you don't compare to your other nice reels. I gave in after watching so many YouTube vids on them. The reel casts okay but feels and sounds very cheap... yes I know, it's $40... But I also own 2 Curado K, 1 Lews Inshore, and 1 Tatula type R. Whenever I switch back to this reel, I immediately hates it. The finish is sloppy and the foam handles are not very comfortable. I'm spoiled so my review won't apply to everyone. Therefore I still gave it 4 stars for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: CPT Dropshot

customer_reviews.title: great real for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Very easy baitcaster to use like the drag click it makes the setting easier. Also very smooth action. Easy to use and veing left handed i love the real with the long handles.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Durability is not all there. Be wary
customer_reviews.text: When I bought the reels I bought three because it was a great deal for the price. First impressions were that the reels worked great. Couple months in one of them had the bearing seize up and render it useless. Little later down the line, I dropped my tackle box on the reel in the boat and it broke off one of the handles and been the crank handle. As much as I’d like to give them a better review, longevity is where I would be wary. They did work great for the time being that they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Smooth casting and worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: I fished the reel today for first time and have no complaints. It is a light very smooth casting reel. No issues with several bass in the 2 rob4 pound range and several snakeheads. It was purchased to try one and see if it was worth having. All and I think it's a great reel.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate to buy. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: You could lay on a table 4 different baitcasters, all costing well over $200 except for the Torrent by Piscifun, use all four of them blindfolded, and you would never know a $40 reel was in the lineup. You may even guess the $40 to be the highest quality one of all. Will absolutely be purchasing more, the reviews don't lie. And aren't exaggerated. I've used baitcasters since I was 11, and the value for the money with the Torrent is unmatched.
customer_reviews.author: ethan medley

customer_reviews.title: For the price so worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got this reel on a gamble feels solid great for the novice or beginner baitcaster person very lightweight not shaky or loose solid construction but so far very impressed can't wait to fish with it and for the price well worth it and I give 4 stars cause solid construction and ease of use and price for the quality you get and I think it will perform very well
customer_reviews.author: Christian Berg

customer_reviews.title: Nearly identical to my Abu Garcia
customer_reviews.text: When I added another bait casting rod to my aresenal I was going to just duplicate my existing setup, but opted for a shorter rod (kayak fishing for bass) and stumbled onto this reel. At nearly half the cost of my Abu Garcia, it just made sense. Spoiled up about 150 to 200 ft of line and it felt so smooth. Excited to wear it out this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget Reel Out.
customer_reviews.text: If it had a few select features and a more solid outer body I would give this 7:1 ratio version 5 stars. It is a very well made reel especially internally. I had the ABU GARCIA Black Max before this one and it is no match for this reel. It casts further, smoother, better and with better control to tune the reel and preventing backlash.
customer_reviews.author: Will West

customer_reviews.title: Torrent is a great learning Reel
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this real and it is great for people learning if they will like the Bait caster thing. I only gave it 4 starts because, once I found that I liked bait casters I got the Piscifun Phantom. So needless to say the Phantom is a little more money and it is nicer. So if you already know how to and want to get a bait caster get the Phantom hands down. If you are trying to learn the Torrent is great. I will be keeping this in the car pm all the road trips
customer_reviews.author: cal429258

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price. Make sure to oil before use.
customer_reviews.text: Good reel for the price but like with any other lower priced reel thumb control is key. Make sure to oil the reel before first use I do understand that some people find that as an inconvenience but I prefer to run reel butter and penn grease so that wasn't a problem in my opinion. Very happy with my purchase so far have cought largemouth, white bass, drum and even a few bluegills. Should be taking it out soon to try on some blue catfish just to see if it will hold up hopefully it does. Tight lines everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple months ago, however yesterday was the first time I took it out of the box and use it. I did some surf fishing with it. And the reel stopped working in the end of the trip. It felt like some time gears disengaged itself even when I was trying to reel the fish in. Dont think I would buy again although the price Is great . I also could not find info of the seller anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and a price that's very afordable.
customer_reviews.text: The unit seems to operate as expected. Its great quality and the price was lower than expected. I have mine loaded with 10# braid line that I use for fishing walleyes and bass. I usually put a mono filament leader on when I feel its needed. I will cast even light lures but you must make sure the reel is set up properly and you have some experience in using a bait casting reel.
customer_reviews.author: Armin Tata

customer_reviews.title: Update I want another one
customer_reviews.text: quick update I just returned from Alaska and I caught some of the biggest fish in my life this real handles every bit of it smoothly . I have two of these now some of my favorite reels everybody's different but I love it and I can outkast all my friends on the same boat doesn't mean I catch more fish but I love the equipment
customer_reviews.author: joshua cavender

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth , built good , awsome price and light.
customer_reviews.text: Hi there if you r looking at my review thank you . im impressed with this beautiful reel great quality nice color combination very smooth , great magnetic breaking. Cant wait to try it out soon and when i do ill let you guy's kno about its performance .thank you. Hi there well u took out my new Baitcasting reel today and I'm so happy with my purchased. Pretty smothe casting. Easy to reel in . ill be looking forward to trying it out more .its well worth the price. Thank u
customer_reviews.author: Monica Samaripa

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth, well built reel that is an outstanding value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for a long awaited trip to go bass fishing with my boys and a good friend. Once I got it set up correctly not to give me a "birds nest" it was absolutely fantastic. Very smooth and easy to use. My lack of experience on setting the tension correctly before casting it the 1st few times was my only disappointment but that was my fault not the reel's. Excellent reel and a great price and if I need more, this is the one I'll buy again. Used it on a fresh water lake w/ 10lb test, fishing with plastic worms for large mouth bass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reel failure
customer_reviews.text: I had great hopes after I used this reel about 4 months ago. It was so good that I purchased the matching rod for this reel. Now that it is all put together and I am preparing a fishing trip on Friday. Now the button to release line will not work. Ow I have the right rod and reel but the reel will not cast. I tried letting line out lossening drag but nothing is working. What do I do?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good value
customer_reviews.text: I use Curados and Revos. I don't believe this reel is as good as those reels, but they cost 3-4 times as much. It does deliver as advertised and basically what most reviews say. There's only one reason I didn't give it 5 stars. That is I don't know about the durability since I've use it just a few times. If you're someone just starting out or don't get caught up in name brands it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Geno287

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for fishing moving baits, and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this reel! I have been using a swim bait, a rattle trap, and a diver for bass. This reel pitches the bait very easily, and it has so many extra adjustments to help tweak your desired technique. Very well priced, and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mull

customer_reviews.title: Han
customer_reviews.text: I usually use abu garcia reels but saw this on sale and thought to give it a try. I find this to be equally as good for around the same price. Time will tell if this reel will meet the challenge but so far I have been pleasantly surprized!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Baitcasting Reel. There is a short learning curve but I was casting consistently within 30 minutes. I am really glad I bought it and would (will) buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Papa Dub

customer_reviews.title: Also felt like the retrieve speed seemed a little lower than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I received the item fast, I spooled it with line,and dialed the brake and spool tension knob to where it should be, after casting for an couple hours the tension on the spool was lose and I was back lashing. Also felt like the retrieve speed seemed a little lower than advertised, my other reels with lower rated retrieves reel in faster. The handle was a tad big for my liking as well and the drag was hard to get to with my thumb. It did cast very smooth when it was casting correctly however. I have returned to amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: David Kalinowski

customer_reviews.title: 2 reels same problem
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but started screeching when casting. lubed bearings including use the oil port on the side near the handle. No luck fixing it. Contacted Picifun via their website and they asked for an order number. I told them I purchased the reels through Amazon and now no response. Purcashed these in 2018 so now out of warranty by a few months. Purchased 2 Pantom X reels this year now I am concerned these will have issues too!
customer_reviews.author: Chevyguy65

customer_reviews.title: Love the beast of a reel
customer_reviews.text: By far a beast of a reel I have spooled it with 40lb braid and has been both my crank and flipping reel. I have casted as light as 1/4oz to 1/2oz and has no issues just adjust the spool. Now I have a lot less backlash and no birds nest so I am very happy I have a few videos on my YouTube channel
customer_reviews.author: Bigsal51fishingtexas

customer_reviews.title: It's 9/9/2020, and this reel is shot.
customer_reviews.text: Started out good, now sounds like it has sand in it. 12 lb test line gets caught between the spool and the reel casing. Now the push down bar wont push down most of the time , have to crank it around to find a spot where it will work. I got one at a slower speed, and it's not having any problems, yet.....get what you pay for, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: cloudwalker

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So I had the opportunity to try it out this week and I will say by far is it top of the line just as good as the high-end stuff at a better price I bought 6 more
customer_reviews.author: Greg Jalovecky

customer_reviews.title: Great reels durable as any
customer_reviews.text: Quality of reel is amazing compared to more of the high dollar reels I'm use to. Proves just because the reel cost more does not mean it's any better or perform any better. This reel performs just as well and I'm hoping for just as long. The reel was purchased for my 17 year old daughter who has been fishing tournaments since she was 8 years old. And trust me she puts her rod and reels thru lots of hard work like any tournament angler
customer_reviews.author: Jason Riddle

customer_reviews.title: exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This reel is very smooth and great casting distance. It seems to feel better and work better than any of my other reels that cost more than twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: What a reel been waiting for this one
customer_reviews.text: Been fishing for over 40 years and had my share of baitcasting reels and by far for the money it's a smooth action and absolutely no over Runs or bird'snest made over 45 casts can't wait to get it wet
customer_reviews.author: george ivan

customer_reviews.title: Nice reel!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first baitcasting reel and after trying it out i am really happy with it. The first few casts i ended up with birdsnests but as i got more used to it i was able to cast with distance. A really well made reel for the price and i would greatly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel! Especially for one so cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this reel with a bit of skepticism because of the price. I was not expecting much from a bait caster this cheap but with all the great reviews I thought why the hell not... I’m glad I took a chance because I have caught many fish on it now and can tell you that it is as smooth and strong as ANY reel I’ve ever used. All these reviews are not BS. BUY ONE! Hell, buy two...
customer_reviews.author: E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great reel!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son. He has used it for a couple of weeks now and says he loves it! He has brought home some big bass the last few days. Don't know if it has anything to do with the reel but I'm sure it helps. He says it is very smooth and handles great. Just bought another one for my son, he wanted 2 because he loves the reel. He now gets to fish with 2 poles. 🤗😁
customer_reviews.author: nasfan55

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and salt!
customer_reviews.text: I love this reel, cast buttery smooth and it is easy to set up for back lash free casting. I use this reel with braid for bass fishing to salt water bay and surf fishing, this is one tough reel if you take good care of it.
customer_reviews.author: linda peterson

customer_reviews.title: It will out cast nearly all other reels.
customer_reviews.text: This is an great baitcaster period. However once you toss in the price it is excellent. I would recommend this reel to any of my friends that are not into have the most expensive rather a great performing item. But we all know some people have to spend the extra money to be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET ONE.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome reel. For the price. GET IT. I love it. I may even buy another. Didn’t have any luck with the rod or their braided line but boy this reel is awesome. Casts and retrieves perfect. After finding my sweet spot I hate putting it down.
customer_reviews.author: tiff123

customer_reviews.title: Great quality reel at a fraction of the cost of comparible others.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my son his first baitcaster but didn't want to spend a ton of money as he's only 12. I saw this reel on sale on Amazon and after reading the reviews and doing a little research, I decided to give it a try. I'm so happy I did. This reel is made very well. It performs as well or better than my $100+ reels and costs a lot less. I will definitely be picking up another one or two of these for myself. Pair this up with a decent rod and you have a great combo at a terrific price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: The design is very good, ergonomic and balanced betwen spool and crank
customer_reviews.text: After long time since this reel arrived to me, I just had chance this morning to test it. I hope the quality on the made materials can resist the extreme hot weather from my living area. The design is very good, ergonomic and balanced betwen spool and crank. Till now break is responding good. I need more time to be more specific on my coments.
customer_reviews.author: geaagr

product_meta.title: Piscifun Torrent Baitcasting Reel 18LB Carbon Fiber Drag Baitcasters Unequaled Affordable High-tech Innovation Baitcast Fishing Reels
feature_bullets: POWERFUL- Advanced, 4-washer, gives the low profile baitcasting reel physically powerful 18LB carbon fiber drag to handle the big fish you are after
DURABLE - Industrial durable-strength, climate-resistant Japanese Hami cut 3604 brass gears, these are all top quality gears you expect for baitcaster fishing reels

PERFORMANCE - Low profile design bait caster featuring 7.1:1 gear ratios specifically designed for the versatile angler. The Super Silent high speed 7.1:1 Gear Ratio baitcasting fishing reel is perfect for getting fish quickly out of cover and faster fishing tactics
UNIQUE - Unique side-plate oil port for prolonged maintenance for Novice to Pro to maximize your baitcast reel life and performance
UNPARALLELED - Strong double wind shafts and backlash-eliminating 0-10 magnetic dial-in settings

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
